executeVote(uint256).details: Proposal must be live for atleast 5 days for it to be executed

params.claimId: The ID of the claim to finalize

returns.yesRatio: The ratio of approved votes to total votes

setConfig(address,address).details: Only callable by the contract owner.

params._insuranceManager: The address of the insuranceManager contract.
params._jagaToken: The address of the Jaga token contract.

returns._0: claimId The ID of the newly created claim

params.approve: Whether to vote yes (`true`) or no (`false`)
params.claimId: The ID of the claim to vote on

executeVote(uint256).notice: Executes the vote result after voting period or once quorum is met

getClaimData(uint256).notice: Get claim data needed for payout

setConfig(address,address).notice: Sets the configuration for Jaga token and insuranceManager contracts.

submitClaim(string,string,string,uint256.notice: Submits a new claim for DAO voting

vote(uint256,bool).notice: Vote on a claim proposal using JagaToken weight
